ovdesc.p: This Application used to run enquiry on bulk orders. For a specific group or portfolios based on certain period

desc.p: Description
Specifies whether the report needs to be printed online or during COB.
Validation Rules:
Specifies the type of print that is used for printing.
Validations
Allowed options are:

p.p: Final - updates the fields SCHEDULE, PRITING.DATE, PRITING.TYPE and LAST.RPTD.PRD NEXT.PRD.START to next printing cycle in WR.KYR.INFO. Final type is allowed only for portfolio or group with a valid record in WR.KYR.INFO application.

desc.p: Starting Date of the Reporting period.
End date of the reporting period.
Multi value field that contain a valid WR.REPORT record.
Mention reports are generated for customers.
Unique reference which identifies the WR.REQUEST.REPORT.ID record.
Mandatory input
1-20 alphanumeric characters
It is multivalue field and it contains valid portfolio number from SEC.ACC.MASTER.
Based on the Customer portfolios the report is to be generated.
If there are multiple Portfolios then the Customer Group defaulted.
It is a noinput field. On authorising status will updated
1-20 alphanumeric characters
Mention style of report will be generated by system.
Is the meta report identifier as defined in Orchestrate.
Meta report holds report styles in use for report, page occurrence and order information.
A valid style from WR.REPORT.STYLE record.
It is a mandatory field.
1-60 alphanumeric characters
Detail description about WR.REQUEST.REPORT.
